oai_dc:dc.dc:title: First Congregational Church of Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color image of First Congregational Church of Memphis.

“First Congregational Church of Memphis -- Member of the United Church of Christ -- Founded 1863 -- Located on corner of Eastmoreland Avenue and -- South Watkins Street, just off Union Avenue in mid-town area. -- Classic colonial lines make it ‘a bit of New England -- in the Heart of Dixie’. -- Worship services and Church School: 11:00 A.M.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: First Congregational Church; Church of Christ; churches; midtown;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Signet Studios, 2232 Central Ave., Memphis, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Made by Dexter Press, Inc. West Nyack, New York; Collection processed by Angela Price
